title: Evaluation Sémantique Basique en Anglais
description: Test de recherche sémantique Basique avec messages et des recherches en anglais sémantiquement différents, avec des recherches très courtes exprimant juste le nom de la notion sémantique recherchée. Le dataset a été généré par Gemini(Google) et préparé/controllé par Nathan Cerisara.

searchs.search_input: The meal was excellent, thank you.
I'm being a bit critical, but the food wasn't great, a bit dry.
I hope you will reimburse me for the money you owe me.
The stadium was on fire yesterday as the home team won, the fans were going crazy.
I studied a lot for these exams, it was difficult.
The flowers are really pretty since they bloomed
Technological progress makes it possible to do difficult things.
Contemporary art is definitely different from classical art.
Do you think we will be able to live in space in the future?
